name: GGbutton
0:
”Alexa, open GG button”
”Alexa, start GG button”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: g. g. button
des:
Every time you want your friends or family to know that you are a winner, tell Alexa to open G G! It is just loud enough to exclaim your victory, but not loud enough to endanger your tympanic membranes!
This skill is based on real life GG button (https://www.ggbutton.com/), if you like it do not hesitate to buy one, or two. I'm not creator (or developer) of real GG button, just a fan of them. So fellas go and make some GG!!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
